participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Sophie is energetic and enjoys expressing herself through fashion. She is creative, loves music, and immerses herself in the world of video games.
participant_1.background: I'm rather skinny as I like to stay in shape. I love wearing skinny jeans and leggings. I'm a blonde girl with really short hair. My favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. My favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games.

participant_2.name: Charlie
participant_2.personality: Charlie is playful and imaginative, often lost in his own world of letters and colors. He has a joyful spirit and dreams big, wanting to be a dog when he grows up.
participant_2.background: I like to look at blocks and sing about letters. I am four years old. I like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. I like to eat chocolate candy. When I grow up I want to be a dog.

content.text: what do you do for a living ?
i like to play video games .
I like to watch crime thriller movies
i like to watch movies and watch movies
